nodes.text: Aika Lars was a female human who lived prior to the Clone Wars. She was the first wife of the human Cliegg Lars, a moisture farmer from Tatooine. The two met on a Core World, where they fell in love, married, and parented a son, Owen. While Owen was still young, Aika died, so Cliegg and his son returned to his family's farm on Tatooine.

Aika Lars was first mentioned in Star Wars: Attack of the Clones: The Visual Dictionary, a Star Wars Legends companion book to Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones. The book was written by David West Reynolds and published by DK Publishing in 2002. In April 2016, Aika was canonized by the Star Wars Character Encyclopedia: Updated and Expanded, a DK reference book written by Pablo Hidalgo.
